Name: learning_rate_schedule
Title: Adaptive Learning Rate Schedules: Comparing different learning rate schedules for diffusion models.
Experiment: In this experiment, we compare the performance of different learning rate schedules on diffusion model performance. We use the final estimated KL as the evaluation metric.

Name: modal_conditioning
Title: Mode-Targeted Generation in 2D Diffusion Models via Gaussian Mixture Conditioning
Experiment:
1. Implement GMM-based conditioning network with learnable mixture components
2. Modify MLPDenoiser to incorporate mode targeting signals
3. Design composite loss combining reconstruction and mode-targeting terms
4. Evaluate using mode coverage metrics, OT distance, and conditional statistics
5. Perform ablation studies on conditioning architectures
6. Analyze trade-off between conditioning strength and sample quality
